title: Wrong end of season Border
body: I finished the season as Platinum 3, but now my border has changed from platinum to Gold?

replies.body: They are rolling out the rewards in waves. All should be out by the 17th or th 18 (I have heard both dates). Nothing to see here.
Yup! This is correct. If you haven't received yours yet, hang tight!
they are using PLACEHOLDER borders. they are X tier 3. X being what you were last season (Silver/gold/plat/diamond/ETC.
